# t-progress-bar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                 | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `percentage`  | `percentage`   | (required) progress percentage              | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `showText`    | `show-text`    | (optional) show progress percentage text    | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `strokeWidth` | `stroke-width` | (optional) progress stroke width            | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `textInside`  | `text-inside`  | (optional) progress text display inside bar | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `variant`     | `variant`      | (optional) show progress variant            | `string`  | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                               | Description                                      |
| -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| `--progress-bar-align-items`                       | Align items of the progress bar                  |
| `--progress-bar-display`                           | Display of the progress bar                      |
| `--progress-bar-width`                             | Width of the progress bar                        |
| `--progress-bar__inner-border-align-items`         | Align items of the progress bar inner            |
| `--progress-bar__inner-border-radius`              | Border radius of the progress bar inner          |
| `--progress-bar__inner-display`                    | Display of the progress bar inner                |
| `--progress-bar__inner-height`                     | Height of the progress bar inner                 |
| `--progress-bar__inner-justify-content`            | Justify content of the progress bar inner        |
| `--progress-bar__inner-left`                       | Left of the progress bar inner                   |
| `--progress-bar__inner-position`                   | Position of the progress bar inner               |
| `--progress-bar__inner-text-color`                 | Text color of inside progress bar                |
| `--progress-bar__inner-text-font-size`             | Text fond size of inside progress bar            |
| `--progress-bar__inner-text-padding`               | Text padding of inside progress bar              |
| `--progress-bar__inner-top`                        | Top of the progress bar inner                    |
| `--progress-bar__inner-transition`                 | Transition of the progress bar inner             |
| `--progress-bar__inner-variant-danger-background`  | Background of progress bar inner variant danger  |
| `--progress-bar__inner-variant-info-background`    | Background of progress bar inner variant info    |
| `--progress-bar__inner-variant-success-background` | Background of progress bar inner variant success |
| `--progress-bar__inner-variant-warning-background` | Background of progress bar inner variant warning |
| `--progress-bar__inner-white-space`                | White space of the progress bar inner            |
| `--progress-bar__inner-width`                      | Width of the progress bar inner                  |
| `--progress-bar__outer-background`                 | Background of the progress bar outer             |
| `--progress-bar__outer-border-radius`              | Border radius of the progress bar outer          |
| `--progress-bar__outer-height`                     | Height of the progress bar outer                 |
| `--progress-bar__outer-margin`                     | Margin of the progress bar outer                 |
| `--progress-bar__outer-overflow`                   | Overflow of the progress bar outer               |
| `--progress-bar__outer-position`                   | Position of the progress bar outer               |
| `--progress-bar__outer-width`                      | Width of the progress bar outer                  |
| `--progress-bar__text-color`                       | Text color of progress bar                       |
| `--progress-bar__text-display`                     | Text display of progress bar                     |
| `--progress-bar__text-font-size`                   | Text fond size of progress bar                   |
